what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Monomelic Amyotrophy ?,"The NINDS conducts and supports a broad range of research on motor neuron diseases. The goals of these studies are to increase understanding of these disorders and to find ways to treat, prevent, and ultimately cure them.",NINDS,Monomelic Amyotrophy
